Title: Nitaboh
Description:
['At a young age, Nitaroh is stricken with an illness that leaves him blind. He inherits the shamisen once used by his mother and is taught its basics by a blind traveling shamisen player. In time, with the help of friends old and new, he walks the paths that leads to his ultimate fateâ€”that of founder of the Tsugaru style of shamisen playing.', '
